error.title: An unexpected error occurred while loading the page.
error.content: Please try again shortly, or go back to the previous page.

new-project-modal.tooltip-intrinsic: These are parameters related to the characteristics of the camera itself, such as the focal length, principal point, and distortion coefficients.
new-project-modal.input-error-already: The project name already exists. Please enter a different name.

camera.disconnect-help-text: After entering the camera model and serial number, please connect the camera device.
camera.connect-help-text: Once the camera device is connected, calibration image capture is enabled.
camera.live-view-tooltip: After the camera device is connected, live view is available.

calibration-image.image-capture-tooltip: Image capture is only available after the camera device is connected.
calibration-image.no-calibration-image-help-text: Connect the camera to capture an image, or modify the path to load an image.
calibration-image.mage-capture-in-progress-help-text: The calibration results will be calculated using the selected image.

detail-footer.title: If the single/continuous capture buttons are not activated, making it difficult to capture calibration images.
detail-footer.content-1: Please check if all the Charuco board setting values have been entered.
detail-footer.content-2: Please check if all the camera setting values have been entered.
detail-footer.content-3-1: Please check the camera connection status.
detail-footer.content-3-2: Capturing is possible in the state.

robot.robot-rc-register-address-tootip: The register address for sending the operation completion signal from the robot to the program
robot.robot-vc-register-address-tootip: The register address for sending the operation completion signal from the program to the robot
robot.robot-fin-register-address-tootip: The register address for sending the operation termination signal from the robot to the program
robot.robot-pose-read-register-address-tootip: The register address for sending the TCP coordinates from the robot to the program
robot.hand-eye-calibration-file-placeholder: Please upload the hand eye calibration result.
